Content: Making a custom fairing for my dual sport but for it to not look wonky (and potentially actually fit without looking weird) the twin headlights need to be under 5.75 inches and all im finding are either halogen or aux headlights that are LED. (Need LED for the other accessories im running so i dont draw too much power) Only real lead i found is the speedmotoco LED twin 4.25 inch but no idea if its DOT, and aside from that idk if its an entire LED assembly or just a projector housing with a retrofit LED inside of it. Buell XB9 headlights seem too small

Title: DOT LED round headlights that are under 5.75 inches?
Author: vyquad
